name: My Little World (ActuallyElmo)
description:
My Little World is a relaxing building game where you create your own world using hexagonal tiles.

 In One Tile Mode you only have access to a single tile at a time, connecting tiles the right way grants points, points level you up and levels give you more tiles to build with. There is also an Easy Mode, where you get tiles much faster, and you can also place any of the tiles you have. 

If puzzles are not your taste, you can play in Freebuilding Mode, where you can build anything you want.

The game is in it's early stage, as there still are some things I want to get done.
